chunk:
COSRX AHA/BHA Clarifying Treatment Toner

Brand: COSRX

Category: Toners/Astringents

Ingredients: Water, Salix Alba (Willow) Bark Water, Pyrus Malus (Apple) Fruit Water, Butylene Glycol, 1,2-Hexanediol, Sodium Lactate, Glycolic Acid, Betaine Salicylate, Allantoin, Panthenol, Ethyl Hexanediol

Directions: After cleansing, spray the toner onto a cot

the toner onto a cotton pad and gently wipe onto face, avoiding the eye and mouth area.For use during the daytime, follow with a broad-spectrum sunscreen rated SPF 30 or greater.

Ingredient concerns: HIGH: Use Restrictions; MODERATE: Allergies & Immunotoxicity; LOW: Cancer, Developmental and Reproductive Toxicity
